definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
(coll.) to feel as though one's head could explode (Tw)
pinyin: yi1 ge5 tou2 liang3 ge5 da4

sentences.english: Béka was a frog-faced boy a head taller than the others.
sentences.chinese: 貝卡是個長着青蛙臉的男孩，比其他人高出一個頭。
意爲這女孩的個頭相當高。

sentences.english: This young chap is very tall.
Modding it is just a complete headache.
sentences.chinese: 這完全是個頭痛的改裝。

sentences.english: This is a Millipede , but it's a giant !
sentences.chinese: 它是千足蟲，但是個頭很大。

sentences.english: This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.
The largest and most widespread heron in North America.
sentences.chinese: 這種蒼鷺在北美分佈最廣，而且個頭最大。

sentences.english: The twins are of equal height.
sentences.chinese: 這對雙胞胎個頭兒一樣高。

sentences.english: She's slim , of medium height , with dark hair.
sentences.chinese: 她身材苗條，個頭適中，頭髮顏色較深。

sentences.english: I would like a shampoo and set.
Hu Fengxue is my good friend, this year 11 years old, short not short.
sentences.chinese: 胡風雪是我的好朋友，今年11歲，個頭不高不矮。

sentences.english: He just dropped that guy on his head.
sentences.chinese: 他真把那個傢伙扔了個頭戧地。

sentences.english: A standoff plate is mounted to an exterior side of the header plate.
sentences.chinese: 僵持板安裝在一個頭板外側。

sentences.english: He mopped up 18 of the 20 first prize awards.
sentences.chinese: 他獲得了20個頭等獎中的18個。

sentences.english: I spoke to the referee after the game but laughing; in a good way.
sentences.chinese: 賽後我和主裁碰了個頭，只是輕鬆地說笑。

sentences.english: He looked like a farmer—he was slim and wore a straw cowboy hat.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來像個農民，個頭挺高，戴一頂牛仔草帽。

definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
at the minimum/at the very least
one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to overdo it/to overstep the limit/excessively/above one's head/overhead
